official_title: A Nurse Led Project to Introduce Hand Lettering as a Form of Creative Art Expression to Patients in an Ambulatory Oncology Setting
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult patients (>age 18) with a cancer diagnosis receiving oral or IV chemotherapy at Dana-Farber on Yawkey 10.
* Able to read and speak English
* Has a minimum appointment time of 60 minutes
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: -Individuals with visual impairment or blindness will be excluded
